name: Ayesha Rahman
persona: Ayesha is a dedicated biochemistry major who consistently strives for high academic achievement. She is organized and self-motivated, balancing her coursework with research projects in the lab. While she occasionally feels nervous before exams, her strong self-discipline and perseverance help her stay on track. Ayesha is driven by a desire to excel and is confident in her ability to overcome challenges. Her goal is to pursue graduate studies in molecular biology.
